strings.10020: {}{Ouch! I need some ice for my head}
strings.10030: {}{You've torn off my head! Oh God, my head's gone!}

strings.10180: {}{How will I earn a living now?}
strings.10230: {}{How can I support my family now?}
strings.10270: {}{Not my fingers, anything but that. Noooooo!}
strings.10280: {}{My arm's been torn off. Oh God, no.}
strings.10410: {}{Christ, why did you have to do that?}

strings.10460: {}{I didn't mean nothin'. Just don't kill me.}
strings.10500: {}{I'm starting to feel cold and sleepy.}
strings.10520: {}{I won't get in your way, just let me live.}
strings.10660: {}{Why does it have to hurt so much?!?}
strings.10790: {}{It's a bad one, oh God, why me.}
strings.10840: {}{You tore my eye out! Oh God, nooooo.}
strings.10890: {}{Where's my eye, if I could just push it back in....}
strings.10970: {}{I think I need to sit down.}
strings.11060: {}{Hey, I part my hair on the *other* side.}
strings.11070: {}{Hah, at least you didn't hit anything important.}
strings.11130: {}{My arm hurts, it's a bad one.}
strings.11170: {}{I can't feel anything, my arm's all numb.}
strings.11190: {}{My thumb's been ripped right off my hand!}
strings.11270: {}{Holy Christ! I didn't think I could feel this much pain.}
strings.11300: {}{My legs, I can't feel my legs.}
strings.11430: {}{If it don't hurt much is it a bad one?}
strings.11440: {}{Heavy weight on chest, gasp, gasp, so thirsty.}
strings.11470: {}{I think something's broken inside, I hurt real bad.}
strings.11480: {}{Ack! Something tore loose inside my chest.}
strings.11490: {}{Why's it have to hurt so damn much?}
strings.11510: {}{I just keep bleeding, it won't (cough, cough) stop.}
strings.11520: {}{I can't breathe and I keep coughin' up blood, that's bad ain't it?}
strings.11530: {}{I've got a hole all the way through me.}
strings.11540: {}{I can see my insides, uh oh.}
strings.11550: {}{My insides are on the outside, that can't be good.}
strings.11560: {}{My lungs keep hissing and (cough, cough, gasp) burbling.}
strings.11570: {}{I'm feeling kinda warm and sleepy now.}
strings.11580: {}{I think I just want to lay down for a while.}
strings.11650: {}{Where's the lower half of my leg? Where is it?!?}
strings.11670: {}{I've been hit. I can't feel my leg.}
strings.11730: {}{I can't feel my leg at all.}
strings.11740: {}{I guess I better find myself a parrot and an eyepatch.}
strings.11760: {}{I'll never be able to support my family now.}
strings.11780: {}{I'm no good to anyone as a cripple. (sob, sob)}
strings.11820: {}{My eye! You'll pay for that one!}
strings.11860: {}{I sure wish I could see just one more sunset.}
strings.11880: {}{It's so dark, and lonely all of a sudden.}
strings.12040: {}{Gotta try harder than that, but not much harder.}
strings.12060: {}{Oh, look at all the pretty birdies.}
strings.12110: {}{You just made the biggest mistake of your life.}
strings.12140: {}{Only need one arm to kill you.}
strings.12160: {}{I only need one finger for you bub.}
strings.12170: {}{Damn, that's gonna take away from my swing.}
strings.12180: {}{I can still take you out of the picture.}
strings.12190: {}{Damn, snapped my arm right in two.}
strings.12210: {}{You just made the biggest mistake of your life}
strings.12270: {}{I've still got another hand to use against you.}
strings.12290: {}{Mmm, that's going to leave a mark.}
strings.12370: {}{Oh, I think you broke a rib!}
strings.12430: {}{Only a worm like you would try for a gut-wound.}
strings.12440: {}{I'm going to replace those organs you just holed, with some of yours.}
strings.12450: {}{Damn, you're better than you look, 'spose you'd hafta be.}
strings.12460: {}{That's not nice at all. I'm going to have to teach you some manners.}
strings.12480: {}{Hope you think it's just as funny when I do that to you.}
strings.12490: {}{I must be getting old. That actually hurt.}
strings.12500: {}{You'll have to do a lot better than that.}
strings.12510: {}{Everything's still workin' well enough to take you out.}
strings.12530: {}{I sure do have a lot of blood in me, well I used to anyway.}
strings.12560: {}{Nobody hits me like that, and lives.}
strings.12570: {}{Soon as I catch my breath (cough, cough) I'm coming for you.}
strings.12590: {}{You don't know what you just started.}
strings.12610: {}{I don't need to stand to kill you!}
strings.12660: {}{I'll teach you to tear my toes off.}

strings.12680: {}{Where's a tourniquet when you need one.}
strings.12710: {}{I don't need to stand to kill you!}
strings.12730: {}{That's going to give me a nice limp for a while.}

strings.412370: {}{Hey, we've got a bleeder, and it's me!}
strings.412390: {}{Nothing trims you down like a disembowelment.}
strings.412400: {}{To understand life, you must fuck death...in the gallbladder.}
strings.412420: {}{That's one way to lose ugly pounds and inches.}
strings.412430: {}{My legs, I can't feel my legs!}
strings.412440: {}{It's getting so cold all of a sudden.}
strings.412470: {}{Now, I'll have to patch my skin again.}
strings.412480: {}{If my vital organs weren't already preserved in a jar that woulda hurt.}
strings.412490: {}{I outa wrap that with clothe before flies get in there.}
strings.412510: {}{I had no idea that I was so dry and brittle.}
strings.412540: {}{Entry wound, exit wound, collect the hole set!}
strings.412620: {}{Just need a parrot and an eye-patch now.}
strings.412630: {}{Gee, it feels as though it's still attached.}
strings.412660: {}{No more line dancing for this old ghoul.}
strings.412680: {}{I wonder if I can reattach that somehow.}
strings.412710: {}{That shin was starting to dry-rot anyway.}
strings.412720: {}{Thanks for taking care of that for me, it was gangrenous,.}
strings.412750: {}{Anyone got a board and some nails to hammer this back together?}
strings.412800: {}{Guess I'll need an eyepatch-just call me Nick Dangerous.}
strings.412810: {}{Arrrr, matey, brings a tear to me one good eye.}
strings.412840: {}{I've got my eye on you, uh, can I have it back now?}
strings.412850: {}{I can still find you with my super-hearing.}
strings.412900: {}{If there were any ghoul gals, I'd be upset with you.}
strings.412910: {}{No more writing my name in the snow.}
strings.412960: {}{I kind of liked being a gentile.}
strings.412980: {}{From a bull to a steer in one blow.}
strings.412990: {}{I feel like I should be guarding a harem now.}
strings.413010: {}{Damn, they've got kryptonite. I'm out of here.}
strings.413020: {}{No one told me it would be dangerous!}
strings.413070: {}{My super-powers are useless against this foe!}
strings.413080: {}{Uh, I've got to talk to a man about a horse.}
strings.413090: {}{I'll be right back. Don't wait up.}
strings.413100: {}{No, no, no. You go ahead. I'll catch up-later.}
strings.413110: {}{I'm late for my root-canal. See you later.}
strings.413120: {}{And then we get inside the giant rabbit and....}
strings.413140: {}{For the love of God, get me out of here!}
strings.413150: {}{Just let me live through this one.}
strings.413180: {}{I'm gonna make like a shepherd and get the flock out of here!}
strings.413190: {}{I'm makin' like a banana and splitttin'}
strings.413200: {}{I've got a bad feeling about this.}
strings.413230: {}{It's got teeth how many inches long?}
strings.413290: {}{I'm not sure that this is such a great idea.}
strings.413300: {}{You go first, I'll watch the rear.}
strings.413310: {}{I don't know, it seems kinda dangerous.}
strings.413320: {}{Are you sure this is really necessary?}
strings.413330: {}{Well, if this is the only way.}
strings.413340: {}{I just don't think I'm cut out for this.}
strings.413350: {}{Hey, a fella could get hurt doin' this, ya'know.}
strings.413360: {}{Isn't there another way to resolve this?}
strings.413380: {}{Someone's going to get hurt, probably me.}
strings.413390: {}{Tell, me when I have to open my eyes.}
strings.413430: {}{Tremble in fear, mighty Lenny now is here!}
strings.413440: {}{Yah, that's right, who's the badass now!}
strings.413490: {}{You just better stop it or, or I'll, uh....}
strings.413500: {}{I did it, I actually did it!}
strings.413510: {}{You hate me, you really hate me!}
strings.413620: {}{Hey, watch it, you almost hit me.}
strings.413700: {}{This old ghoul's more spry than you bargained for huh?}
strings.413770: {}{Was that the best you can do? Was it really?}
strings.413790: {}{Your heart's not in this is it?}
strings.416050: {}{Human, you've got a lot of nerve.}
strings.416090: {}{I think you took off an ear!}
strings.416180: {}{If I can't type anymore, you're dead.}
strings.416450: {}{I've had about all I can take of you.}
strings.416510: {}{A little lower and I'd be sterile.}
strings.416590: {}{Normal, you're going to pay for that.}
strings.416660: {}{Gonna make it harder to kick your ass.}
strings.417140: {}{Ye gods... if other mutants could see me now.}
strings.417170: {}{Must be slipping in my old age.}
strings.417200: {}{I got a can of Sh! with your name on it.}
strings.417240: {}{Feet, hands, head... all going in your asshole.}
strings.417310: {}{Gonna have to break out the big guns, huh?}
strings.417340: {}{Time to add another notch to the gun.}
strings.417390: {}{This is gonna hurt you a lot more than it hurts me.}
strings.417440: {}{Why don't you just lie down and die?}
strings.417540: {}{When was the last time you got spanked?}
strings.417590: {}{One fist, two fist, red fist, blue fist...}
strings.417610: {}{Let me know when you get scary.}
strings.417690: {}{Keep at it. Maybe you'll hit me someday.}
strings.417710: {}{I need a nice cold drink. Nothing's happening here.}

strings.420560: {}{Where the hell did this gaping hole in my chest come from?}

strings.421100: {}{I gotta get the hell outta here.}

strings.421160: {}{Gotta get out of here gotta get out of here gotta get out of here}
strings.421200: {}{I haven't been in a fight since fifth grade.}

strings.421240: {}{I think I'd rather be rear tactical observer.}
strings.421250: {}{I'm ready to rock and roll. Whatever that means.}
strings.421260: {}{I'm gonna rip off your head and...uh...crap, I forget the rest.}

strings.421280: {}{You're going down like a two chip whore.}
strings.421330: {}{Good thing all those years of AD&D has taught me a few things about courage.}

strings.421450: {}{You're going down like a two chip whore.}
strings.421480: {}{You want some of Myron, huh? Then...uh...you'll GET some! Yeah!}
strings.421500: {}{You're lucky I'm a 20 lb. weakling, or you'd be dead right now.}
strings.421520: {}{I work hard, and I fight...well, actually, I don't work that hard. Nevermind.}
strings.421530: {}{These fights sure are a lot more fun from a distance.}
strings.421540: {}{I still think I should be rear tactical observer.}
strings.421550: {}{You can take two weeks and kiss my lily white ASS.}
strings.421560: {}{I can't believe I'm actually in a fight.}
strings.421570: {}{I haven't been in a fight since fifth grade.}

strings.448000: {}{I'm thick skulled but that still hurt.}
strings.448010: {}{I've got one hell of a headache.}
strings.448030: {}{I can do head shots too you know!}
strings.448100: {}{I'll kill you with my other arm.}
strings.448110: {}{I don't need both arms to ruin your day!}
strings.448130: {}{Ouch! I can use a sling over here.}
strings.448220: {}{I can take the likes of you with only one arm.}
strings.448240: {}{You hit my arm. I tear off your arm!}
strings.448310: {}{I'm minus a couple of ribs after that one.}
strings.448350: {}{Is this a fight or are you just trying to get my attention?}
strings.448360: {}{Let me know if that was supposed to hurt. I'll cry for you.}
strings.448370: {}{Did your mama teach you how to fight?}
strings.448380: {}{Oh the pain (yawn). Please don't hurt me any more.}
strings.448390: {}{You call that a hit. Let me show you how it's done!}
strings.448400: {}{I'm going to kick your ass for that one.}
strings.448460: {}{Where's a stimpak when you need one?}
strings.448470: {}{As soon as I can move again, you've had it}
strings.448490: {}{I'm going to do the monster mash on your face!}
strings.448600: {}{Great. I'll be the only Deathclaw at home with a limp.}
strings.448620: {}{You'll pay with your leg for what you did to mine.}
strings.448640: {}{I don't need two legs to kill you.}
strings.448720: {}{Not the leg... can't walk right as it is.}
strings.448730: {}{You cripple my leg, I cripple your leg.}
strings.448830: {}{I can't see you, but I can smell you.}
strings.448840: {}{I'm going to need glasses after that one!}
strings.448900: {}{The groin is such a cheap shot!}
strings.448920: {}{That's fighting dirty. How about if I hit you in the crotch?}
strings.448940: {}{Crotch shot... good thing I'm not human!}
strings.449060: {}{Out of the way, I'm moving out!}
strings.449070: {}{I'm not retreating, this is a strategic withdrawal.}
strings.449090: {}{I've got to get out of here!}
strings.449200: {}{Come here so I can hit you!}
strings.449220: {}{It's you or me... and I vote you!}
strings.449260: {}{Best kiss your ass goodbye while you still can.}
strings.449300: {}{I'll see you on the front line!}
strings.449310: {}{Time to reach out and touch someone!}
strings.449330: {}{I'm going to fall on you like ugly on a human!}
strings.449410: {}{This is going to hurt you a lot more than it does me!}
strings.449420: {}{Do unto others before they do unto you!}
strings.449430: {}{If there's a part of you that doesn't hurt, it's next!}
strings.449450: {}{Tell me your name so I can contact your next of kin.}
strings.449460: {}{I'm the one who put the 'death' in deathclaw!}
strings.449470: {}{It's better to give than to receive!}
strings.449480: {}{I hope you're enjoying this as much as I am!}
strings.449490: {}{Did that hurt? If not I can do it harder next time.}
strings.449510: {}{It'll take more than a stimpak to fix you when I'm done.}
strings.449520: {}{I hope you have medical insurance. You're going to need it.}
strings.449530: {}{Here a rip, there a rip, everywhere a rip rip...}
strings.449540: {}{I don't care who started it, I intend to finish it!}
strings.449550: {}{I love the sound of tearing flesh, don't you?}
strings.449560: {}{Just warming up, the best is yet to come.}
strings.449590: {}{If you fall over and stay there I'll go away!}
strings.449600: {}{Would it help you if I just stood here?}
strings.449610: {}{Glasses. You should look into getting some glasses.}
strings.449620: {}{You need me to paint a target for you?}
strings.449630: {}{Why are you aiming over there when I'm over here?}
strings.449640: {}{I hope you aren't making a career out of this.}
strings.449650: {}{How did you manage to miss something as big as I am?}
strings.449670: {}{I'm a nimble little shit aint I?}
strings.449680: {}{You should be glad your mother didn't see you do that.}
strings.449690: {}{You really should consider getting more practice.}
strings.449700: {}{How embarrassing. I won't tell anyone how lame you are.}
strings.449710: {}{So, you're trained to miss the target?}
strings.449730: {}{Don't cry. Maybe you'll get lucky next time.}
strings.449740: {}{Way to go, Grace. What do you do for an encore?}
strings.449750: {}{That was a shinning example of missing the target.}
strings.449760: {}{I'm beginning to think you're not cut out for this.}
strings.449770: {}{Are you trying to make me laugh myself to death?}
strings.449780: {}{You fanned the air on that one!}
strings.449790: {}{Did you just miss me or what!}

strings.4054: {}{|0xff00ff00 A reward for completing specific tasks, or defeating enemies in combat. More experience points are required to attain higher Levels.}
strings.4055: {}{|0xff00ff00 What the world knows of your actions and deeds. This will modify NPC reactions.}
strings.4056: {}{|0xff00ff00 These are the effects of the choices you make during the game.}
strings.4057: {}{|0xff00ff00 Perks add additional abilities. Every third experience level, you can choose one perk.}
strings.4058: {}{|0xff00ff00 A counter that keeps track of the type and numbers of creatures you have slaughtered, or have seen killed in your presence.}
strings.4059: {}{|0xff00ff00 Use free skill points to increase the level of a skill.  As you get better at a given skill, however, it takes more points to raise that skill.  Mastering a skill can take a lot of time and effort.}
strings.4060: {}{|0xff00ff00 Tag skills are skills your character specializes in.  Each tag skill gains +20%, and increases twice as fast.  You must pick three tag skills.}
strings.4061: {}{|0xff00ff00 Optional traits describe your character in more detail.  All traits will have positive and negative effects.  You may choose up to two traits during creation.}

strings.16001: {}{Weapon traits are effects, positive or negative, that are inherent to the weapon.}
strings.16021: {}{Each bullet has a chance to suppress all targets within burst range (even if it doesn't hit).}
strings.16031: {}{+1 Perception for sight bonus calculations. (+2 with Four Eyes trait)}
strings.16051: {}{100% chance to cause knockback. This knockback is also much longer than normal.}
strings.16071: {}{20% chance to roll vs target's endurance to cripple random limb}
strings.16091: {}{Attacking with this weapon doesn't desneak you.}
strings.16101: {}{The number of projectiles that may hit a single target decreases with the distance to the target. This allows you to hit many targets with few bullets at longer ranges, while concentrating the damage to a single target at close ranges.}
strings.16111: {}{Reloading AP cost depends on how much ammo needs to be loaded.}
strings.16121: {}{This weapon is well suited to the double-tap shooting technique, which allows you to fire multiple times in a quick succession. In game terms, your extra AP regen doesn't pause during the weapon animation.}
strings.16131: {}{The Damage Resistance of the target is increased by 40%.}
strings.16141: {}{The Damage Resistance of the target is decreased by 40%.}
strings.16151: {}{This weapon is reliable. Weapon jams and misfires are two times as less likely.}
strings.16161: {}{This weapon is unreliable. It is twice as likely to jam or misfire.}
strings.16171: {}{This weapon is durable. It can sustain 50% more wear.}
strings.16181: {}{This weapon is fragile. It deteriorates 50% faster.}
strings.16201: {}{This weapon is capable of reloading on the move. It requires 20% more action points when doing so.}
strings.16211: {}{Torso shots with this weapon uses aimed crit chance.}
strings.16221: {}{This weapon will recursively attack additional targets within 2 radius range.}
strings.16231: {}{Knockback direction caused by this weapon will be reversed.}
strings.16241: {}{Knockback direction caused by this weapon will be random.}
strings.16271: {}{The Damage Threshold of the target is decreased by 40%.}
strings.16281: {}{After each firing of the weapon, manual action is required to ready the weapon again.}
strings.16291: {}{When performing targeted bursts with this weapon, only the target will be hit with the bullets.}
strings.16301: {}{This weapon is extremely vulnerable to electromagnetic interference and has safety measure that degrades performance at close range to prevent feedback. Damage scales based on distance reaching maximum at 30 hex range.}
strings.16311: {}{The weapon is glued to you! Don't have to worry about dropping it.}
strings.16321: {}{This weapon has the ability to disrupt electronic equipment.}
strings.16331: {}{The compact and lightness of the weapon allows you to present arms without effort, halving initial delay for aimed attacks.}
strings.16341: {}{This weapon can fire over walls and buildings but cannot be at or from indoors.}
strings.16351: {}{The weapon is capable of shooting through walls; no safe rooms anywhere!}
strings.16361: {}{It takes a couple of shots before reaching the weapons desired firerate.}
strings.16371: {}{Constant fire in a small timeframe may result in the weapon overheating and jamming.}
strings.16381: {}{Burst mode with this weapon will apply Winded condition for short duration that depends on percent of bullets hit.}
strings.16391: {}{Fuse time may be up to 25% longer or shorter than normal.}
strings.16401: {}{"Double" mode with this weapon hits with both bullets if slugs are loaded.}
strings.16411: {}{10% chance per level to fail to explode.}
strings.16421: {}{Reloads up to 50% of weapon ammo capacity per time.}
strings.16431: {}{When your weapon is deployed you are immune to weapon drops and knockdowns.}
strings.16441: {}{You cannot drop your weapon, it becomes unready instead.}
strings.16451: {}{Your weapon occupies both hand slots and cost additional AP to equip and unequip.}
strings.16461: {}{It takes an effort to start this weapon up...}
strings.16501: {}{This weapon can be reloaded with assistance of others by using appropriate ammo on gun wielder.}
strings.16521: {}{This weapon has the ability to disrupt electronic equipment in 10 hexes radius.}
strings.16531: {}{Two to the chest, one to the head. Critical shots on the target become more deadly with 100% More Critical Damage.}
strings.16541: {}{This weapon gives double legendary score in combat against other players.}
strings.16551: {}{This weapon always requires a charge-up before firing.}
strings.16561: {}{This melee weapon hits up to two adjacent targets on the both sides of the main target.}

strings.17041: {}{Each bullet has a chance to suppress all targets within burst range (even if it doesn't hit).}

strings.17171: {}{10% more likely to cause eye damage}
strings.17181: {}{10% more likely to cripple arms or legs}
strings.17191: {}{10% more likely to cause armor bypass. Also 15% stronger bypass if one is caused.}

strings.17231: {}{Increases the one-hex by 10. This makes bursting at close range more devastating to individual targets.}
strings.17241: {}{Firing this weapon costs 5% less Action Points than normal.}
strings.17251: {}{Attacking from behind while sneaking with this weapon cause 50% more damage.}
strings.17291: {}{33% Less AP required for Aimed Shots.}
strings.17301: {}{Damage increase up to 30% on low health targets.}

strings.18041: {}{Restores up to 25 damage applying same number to bleed. Ignores bandaged status.}
